LanguageData.Bridge.label: 간단한 다리
LanguageData.Bridge.description: A basic 목재en pier-style bridge. Useful for crossing rivers without getting your feet wet. Can be built on shallow water, marsh or mud.

LanguageData.DeepBridge.label: 튼튼한 다리
LanguageData.DeepBridge.description: A sturdy, reinforced 목재en bridge, designed to allow passage across deeper water. A bit harder to build than a basic bridge. Can only be built on deep water.
LanguageData.DeepBridge_Blueprint.label: Deep Water Bridge (청사진)
LanguageData.DeepBridge_Frame.label: Deep Water Bridge (건설 중)
LanguageData.DeepBridge_Frame.description: A sturdy, reinforced 목재en bridge, designed to allow passage across deeper water. A bit harder to build than a basic bridge. Can only be built on deep water.
LanguageData.Boardwalk.label: 잔교
LanguageData.Boardwalk.description: It looks like a bridge, but it sits over land. Use it to put aesthetic finishing touches on your bridges or piers. Can be built on land in close proximity to water.
